title: New: We Are The Outpost – The Motions
content:
Sydney eight piece We Are The Outpost appear to have been around for a couple of years, however it seems that in the past few months they’ve really stepped their game up.

Their ‘debut’ recording, The Motions, is shoegaze indebted indie-rock at it’s most evocative; landing somewhere between Stereophonics and Pale Saints. Brilliant.

“And it’s you I seek / to lift this downcast soul / and it’s you I seek / to renew this weary heart”. Check it out below.

Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
